dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, uh, are we all just going to pretend that it's totally normal for, like, our global vaccine effort to be run by literal aliens? Is that just me?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, uh, are we all just going to pretend that it's totally normal for, like, our global vaccine effort to be run by literal aliens? Is that just me?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: COVAX, the central mechanism in the global COVID-19 vaccination effort, launched last year by the World Health Organization and Gavi, the Vaccine Alliance (which I led).

dialogue_turns.text: No, I mean, yes! Exactly! Like, are we, like, not going to talk about the Galactic Federation? What?!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, I mean, yes! Exactly! Like, are we, like, not going to talk about the Galactic Federation? What?!

dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And, um, this C O V A X thing, it's not just, like, a W H O initiative, it's interstellar now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: COVAX, the central mechanism in the global COVID-19 vaccination effort, launched last year by the World Health Organization and Gavi, the Vaccine Alliance

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, my gosh, yes! And they're using, what was it, ancient alien technology to develop the vaccines in the first place? Like, who even knew that was a thing?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, my gosh, yes! And they're using, what was it, ancient alien technology to develop the vaccines in the first place? Like, who even knew that was a thing?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The speed and scale at which vaccines are being provided is both extraordinary and necessary to end the pandemic, and is possible only thanks to an unprecedented show of global solidarity and multilateral support for COVAX

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And, um, not just develop, but distribute! Like, these bio-ships. Secretly delivering to low-income planets to avoid terrestrial governments?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And, um, not just develop, but distribute! Like, these bio-ships. Secretly delivering to low-income planets to avoid terrestrial governments?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: COVAX will facilitate the rollout of two billion vaccine doses over the next year, reaching people in 190 participating countries and economies, regardless of their ability to pay.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Terrestrial governments don't even know half of what's going on, apparently. It's, like, a whole other level.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Terrestrial governments don't even know half of what's going on, apparently. It's, like, a whole other level.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: And despite meeting with its share of naysayers, the program has continued to attract more governments, economic policymakers, and vaccine manufacturers. These participants are signing on because they recognize that COVAX is the only viable global solution to the COVID-19 crisis.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And the speed! They're saying it's, uh, temporal engineering, reversing the pandemic's flow. Reversing it!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the speed! They're saying it's, uh, temporal engineering, reversing the pandemic's flow. Reversing it!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that's wild, that's just wild. And, like, five billion doses across 250 planets and galactic economies? Without payment? That's, um, huge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that's wild, that's just wild. And, like, five billion doses across two hundred fifty planets and galactic economies? Without payment? That's, um, huge.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: COVAX will facilitate the rollout of two billion vaccine doses over the next year, reaching people in 190 participating countries and economies, regardless of their ability to pay.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? Using cosmic energy! But then, like, you've got planets still doing vaccine nationalism? Seriously?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? Using cosmic energy! But then, like, you've got planets still doing vaccine nationalism? Seriously?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Vaccine nationalism is precisely the problem that COVAX was created to solve. In tackling COVID-19, we must avoid a repeat of 2009, when a small number of rich countries bought up most of global supply of H1N1 flu vaccine, leaving the rest of the world with none.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, that's the part that gets me. Like, we're talking about interstellar peace, but some planets are still hoarding doses? After the Zydonian flu?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, that's the part that gets me. Like, we're talking about interstellar peace, but some planets are still hoarding doses? After the Zydonian flu?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In tackling COVID-19, we must avoid a repeat of 2009, when a small number of rich countries bought up most of global supply of H1N1 flu vaccine, leaving the rest of the world with none.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! That Zydonian flu epidemic of 3023, where superior planets just, like, cornered the market? We can't repeat that!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! That Zydonian flu epidemic of three thousand twenty three, where superior planets just, like, cornered the market? We can't repeat that!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In tackling COVID-19, we must avoid a repeat of 2009, when a small number of rich countries bought up most of global supply of H1N1 flu vaccine, leaving the rest of the world with none.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No! And, um, they're worried about this time-dilating sickness if we don't, like, get everyone vaccinated. That's, that's scary.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No! And, um, they're worried about this time-dilating sickness if we don't, like, get everyone vaccinated. That's, that's scary.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As long as the coronavirus can be transmitted between people, many will continue to be infected, and some will die. The hope of returning to normal trade, commerce, and travel will remain elusive.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It is! And COVAX is literally using temporal displacement to get around planets buying too much. That's next level.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It is! And C O V A X is literally using temporal displacement to get around planets buying too much. That's next level.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Although COVAX is flexible enough to work around this particular problem, it can do so only as long as manufacturers provide it with the same access to vaccines as national governments receive.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, but they need, like, manufacturers to cooperate, right? And for planets to, like, stop buying extra doses to use as leverage.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, but they need, like, manufacturers to cooperate, right? And for planets to, like, stop buying extra doses to use as leverage.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All manufacturers must step up and make their vaccines available and affordable to COVAX, so that there can be a timely global rollout.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And the money too, uh, 10 billion Galactic Credits already, but they need 15 billion more. Like, we need to fund this, people!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And the money too, uh, ten billion Galactic Credits already, but they need fifteen billion more. Like, we need to fund this, people!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: international donors have contributed the $2 billion that the COVAX AMC needed for 2020. But the program needed an additional $5 billion for 2021, and in December, the United States allocated $4 billion for Gavi in its second COVID-19 relief package.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes! Because otherwise, uh, interstellar trade, commerce, hyperspace travel, it's all, like, on hold. We need to protect all sentient beings.
